ingredients.ingredient: 1 (12 ounce) package frozen shelled edamame (green soybeans)
½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper
3 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, or more as needed

cookingTips: Boil edamame with garlic until very tender, about 5-7 minutes
Drain well and allow to cool slightly before pulsing
Drizzle olive oil while processing for creamy, hummus-like consistency
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user through boiling edamame with garlic until soft, then pulsing with olive oil for a creamy dip or spread.
